name: Instagram Intelligence + AI Vision Analysis API
description: Scrape Instagram profiles and posts via mobile proxy, with AI-powered vision analysis for account type detection, content themes, sentiment, authenticity scoring, and brand safety recommendations.
longDescription: Full Instagram intelligence pipeline: scrape profiles and posts through mobile proxies, then analyze with AI vision (GPT-4o/Claude). Detect account types, content themes, sentiment, authenticity scores, and brand safety. Essential for influencer marketing, competitive analysis, and brand monitoring.
whyMobileProxy: Instagram aggressively blocks non-residential IPs and requires authenticated sessions for most data. Mobile carrier IPs (4G/5G) mimic real Instagram app traffic, bypassing rate limits and login walls that block datacenter and residential proxies. This is the only reliable method for programmatic Instagram data extraction at scale.

posts.posts: Post[] — id, caption, likes, comments, hashtags, timestamp, imageUrl, isVideo, isSponsored

analyze.accountType: influencer | business | personal | bot/fake | meme_page | news_media

vs.name: HypeAuditor
vs.limitation: No raw data access, limited API, pre-computed reports only

vs.name: Social Blade
vs.limitation: Historical stats only, no AI analysis, no post content

vs.name: Modash
vs.limitation: Influencer discovery focus, no authenticity audit

vs.name: PhantomBuster IG
vs.limitation: Rate limited, no AI vision, frequent breakage

competitive.ourAdvantage: Real-time Instagram data + AI vision analysis at $0.01-0.15/request. Includes authenticity auditing, brand safety scoring, and content theme detection. No monthly commitment.

optional.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
optional.description: Required for AI vision analysis (/analyze/:username/images). Falls back to heuristic analysis without this.

optional.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
optional.description: Alternative to ANTHROPIC_API_KEY for GPT-4o vision analysis. Anthropic is preferred.

optional.name: PROXY_HOST
optional.description: Mobile proxy host for high-volume scraping. Not required for basic usage.

requiredEnvVars.note: All env vars are optional — the API works without any keys using heuristic analysis and direct requests. AI vision features degrade gracefully.

limitations: Private accounts return limited public data only
AI vision analysis requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY or OPENAI_API_KEY — falls back to heuristic analysis without them
Rate limited to 20 proxy requests/minute per client IP
Story/Reel data not yet supported (post images + captions only)
Instagram may serve different data based on region

/api/instagram/profile/:username.description: Get Instagram profile data with engagement metrics

/api/instagram/posts/:username.description: Get recent posts with captions, likes, comments, hashtags

/api/instagram/analyze/:username.description: Full AI-powered profile analysis: account type, themes, sentiment, authenticity

/api/instagram/analyze/:username/images.description: AI vision analysis of post images: themes, style, brand safety

/api/instagram/audit/:username.description: Authenticity audit: fake follower detection, bot signals
